Time series - A taxonomy based survey. In proceedings of the Intelligent Computer Communication and Processing (ICCP) (pp.

item.title: Research
item.description: My thesis goal is to extract patterns and knowledge from sensor data in order to drive improvements in the way customers use a given product. In this context, the fields of interest are: Time Series Analysis, code Recommendation Systems Sentiment Analysis I am part of the Knowledge Engineering Research Group. My current focus is on overcoming source signal dependence in time series analysis.
